Palettes in R series

Diognes

Source: vignettes/palette_samples.Rmd
palette_samples.Rmd

A showcase of some palettes

Rseries contains beauty palettes to personalize plots with the style of series of plataforms like Netflyx, Amazon Prime or local TV from Latin American Countries. The avaliable palettes are :

Netflyx family palettes

lupin | Lupin

GambitoDama | Gambito de dama

EstamosMuert | Estamos Muertos

Anime family palettes

asobi | Asobi Asobase

bolt | Boruto

cardcaptor | Cardcaptor Sakura

ggo | SAO Alternative: Gun Game Online

hataraku | Cells at Work!

mobu2 | Mob Psycho 100 II

naru | Naruto

nichi | Nichijou

poputepik | Pop Team Epic

sng | Suisei no Gargantia

takt | Takt Op.Destiny

tokyorev | Tokyo Revengers

yona | Akatsuki no Yona

yuri | Yuri!!! on Ice

yuru2 | Yuru Camp△
